tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: Lyla in the Loop
programme.sub-title: Moon Rock Cove; Rainbow Collection
programme.desc: Liana and Louisa compete to see who is more outdoorsy; the Loops are bored on their camping trip until Lyla suggests a scavenger hunt.(n)

programme.title: Nature Cat
programme.sub-title: The Grand Mystery of the Grand Canyon; Strongest Show on Earth
programme.desc: The group visits the Grand Canyon to find out how it was created; Nature Cat and his friends try to figure out who is the strongest.(n)

programme.title: Molly of Denali
programme.sub-title: Dinjik Dhah; Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: Molly and her friends learn how to tan their own moose hide; Molly and Tooey find a message in a bottle while playing on the riverbank.(n)

programme.title: Hero Elementary
programme.sub-title: Sara Loses Her Snap; A Soupie Mystery
programme.desc: Sara loses her super strength on the same day the crew has to move a giant, heavy burger; the crew sets out to find Soupy, a mysterious creature that has been spotted in Super Superior Lake.(n)

programme.title: Cyberchase
programme.sub-title: The Cyberchase Movie, Part 2
programme.desc: Hacker and his team drill inside a nature preserve, inadvertently destroying animal habitats.(n)

programme.title: Let's Go Luna!
programme.sub-title: Totally Totem; Glacier or Bust
programme.desc: Andy and Luna enlist the help of a totem pole artist to tell their story; Andy wants to see the blue light of the Mendenhall Glacier ice caves.(n)

programme.title: Clifford the Big Red Dog
programme.sub-title: The March of the Sea Turtles; A Squirrely Situation
programme.desc: The kids try to figure out why the newly-hatched baby sea turtles walk around town instead of crawling into the ocean; Emily Elizabeth and Clifford are inspired to turn Clifford's doghouse into a warm and cozy paradise.(n)

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.sub-title: Monster Truckin'
programme.desc: Elmo and Chris make a monster truck jump and try to design a ramp out of a pizza box lid.(n)

programme.title: Pinkalicious & Peterrific
programme.sub-title: Peterrific; Mother's Day Surprise
programme.desc: Peter builds the tallest block tower ever; Pinkalicious and Peter plan something extra special for Mother's Day.(n)

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.sub-title: Sticky Space Race; The Big Ice
programme.desc: Zee's super sticky slime spills on Zee and MacBarm, leaving them stuck together; when Marwyn runs out of ice, the Martians send a giant hunk of ice.(n)

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.sub-title: Grouch-ercise
programme.desc: Oscar the Grouch has been feeling terrible and Elmo, Abby Cadabby, Grundgetta and Nina find different exercises he could do to feel better; when they come back, they find Oscar feeling good and rotten again after a long, grouchy walk.(n)

programme.title: Milo
programme.sub-title: Milo the Dancer
programme.desc: A young cat, Milo, lives with his parents at their drycleaner; their robotic washing machine, Suds, lets Milo and his friends try on different outfits, introducing them to a realm of endless possibilities.(n)

programme.title: Work It Out Wombats!
programme.sub-title: Brother Day; Cafe Chaos
programme.desc: Malik learns the key to a successful.(n)

programme.title: Work It Out Wombats!
programme.sub-title: Me Time; Zadie and the Big, Loud, Noisy Thing
programme.desc: The Wombats go on a quest to figure out all the elements that go into creating the perfect.(n)

programme.title: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
programme.sub-title: Daniel and O's Road Trip; Daniel's Puppet Plan
programme.desc: Daniel and O pretend to go on a trolley road trip; when Daniel and his friends make puppets at the library, they find out that making a plan can help them put on a better puppet show.(n)

programme.title: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
programme.sub-title: Tiger Family Lunch; Dinnertime at Jodi's
programme.desc: Daniel gets distracted at a picnic lunch at the playground with Mom Tiger; Daniel helps make pan pans for dinner at Jodi's house.(n)

programme.title: Carl the Collector
programme.sub-title: The Fake Mustache Collection; The Lint Dinosaur Collection
programme.desc: Nico is tired of being mistaken for her twin sister; Carl is upset when Nico breaks the Lint Dinosaur Monday rules and makes a Lint Monster instead.(n)

programme.title: Curious George
programme.sub-title: Your Churn, George; Going Nuts
programme.desc: George volunteers to make butter; George becomes involved in a territorial dispute.(n)

programme.title: Donkey Hodie
programme.sub-title: The Breakfast Bowl; Dancing Dandelions
programme.desc: Donkey and Panda compete in the Breakfast Bowl; Donkey, Panda and Bob Dog plant dancing dandelion seeds and look for the right music to help the flowers grow.(n)

programme.title: Donkey Hodie
programme.sub-title: Best Friends Day; Silly Sticky Situation
programme.desc: Donkey and Panda have different ideas about how to celebrate Best Friends Day; while getting ready to make big art, the pals get stuck to a big glue bottle.(n)

programme.title: Elinor Wonders Why
programme.sub-title: Going With the Tide; Slime Time
programme.desc: The kids try to build a sandcastle, but have trouble finding the right spot on the beach; Elinor uses slime to get a stuck ring off Camilla's finger.(n)

programme.title: Rosie's Rules
programme.sub-title: Dragon Drama; Rosie's Lucky Charm
programme.desc: Rosie and Javi prepare for the arrival of a dragon; Rosie finds a lucky charm in the backyard.(n)

programme.title: Rosie's Rules
programme.sub-title: Rosie Rocks Mariachi; Rosie Canta un Corrido
programme.desc: Rosie performs in Papa's mariachi band; Rosie wants to sing a corrido for the family talent show.(n)

programme.title: Xavier Riddle and the Secret Museum
programme.sub-title: I Am Nikola Tesla; I Am Nellie Bly
programme.desc: Xavier is upset thinking he won't be able to bring the museum to his friend in Japan, but Nikola Tesla encourages him not to give up; Nellie Bly helps Yadina overcome her fear of the monkey bars.(n)

programme.title: Alma's Way
programme.sub-title: A Gift for Granny; Soccer Friends
programme.desc: Alma puts together a care package for Granny Isa; Beto and Rafia are nervous to play each other in soccer.(n)

programme.title: Alma's Way
programme.sub-title: All About Alma; Alma's Playdate
programme.desc: Alma is consumed with her starring role in a musical; Alma and Harper have a playdate at the Rivera house.(n)

programme.title: Lyla in the Loop
programme.sub-title: Piece of Cake; Kibbles and Coins
programme.desc: Lyla and Stu make a mess decorating cupcakes; Lyla tries to retrieve Everett's lost coin.(n)

programme.title: Arthur
programme.sub-title: Fifteen
programme.desc: Arthur and his friends find out exactly how much they can accomplish within 15 minutes.(n)

programme.title: Odd Squad
programme.sub-title: Oscar and the Oscarbots; Picture Day
programme.desc: Oscar's Oscarbots get lost in town; Otto and Olive try to figure out why people are becoming plaid and striped.(n)

programme.title: Odd Squad
programme.sub-title: A Case of the Sing-Alongs; Ms. O Uh-0h
programme.desc: Mayor Macklemore catches a case of the Sing-A-Longs; Ms. O from the past appears at the office.(n)

programme.title: Wild Kratts
programme.sub-title: Chimpanzee and Me
programme.desc: A young chimp cheers up Chris when he sprains his ankle while climbing in Uganda's tropical forests.(n)

programme.title: Wild Kratts
programme.sub-title: Groundhog Wake Up Call
programme.desc: The Kratt boys learn about hibernation when Aviva falls into a deep sleep.(n)

programme.title: Lyla in the Loop
programme.sub-title: Piece of Cake; Kibbles and Coins
programme.desc: Lyla and Stu make a mess decorating cupcakes; Lyla tries to retrieve Everett's lost coin.(n)

programme.title: Nature Cat
programme.sub-title: A Little Kelp From My Friends; Mission to Mars
programme.desc: The crew tries to save the kelp forests from being eaten by sea urchins; the gang visits Mars in a daydream, hoping to meet aliens.(n)

programme.title: Molly of Denali
programme.sub-title: Heat Wave; It Came From Beyond
programme.desc: A heat wave hits Qyah, and Molly is determined to find out the highest temperature on record; Molly and Trini must save Qyah from a wildflower.(n)

programme.title: Hero Elementary
programme.sub-title: Search and Rescue; Secret Lives of Teachers
programme.desc: Sparks' crew searches for two schoolmates who are hiding somewhere in Citytown; the kids are surprised to see their teacher outside of school.(n)

programme.title: Cyberchase
programme.sub-title: An Urchin Matter
programme.desc: The CyberSquad explores why the once-healthy kelp in Big Bay is washing ashore.(n)

programme.sub-title: Mr. Precise; The Case of the Missing Cheese
programme.desc: Carmen breaks her favorite clock; Leo learns about Swiss cheese.(n)
